vclaim: Gwen Shamblin Lara faked her death in a plane crash in 2021 and is still alive.
title: No, Gwen Shamblin Lara Did Not Fake Her Death
subtitle: The weight loss church leader was the subject of the HBO Max documentary series, "The Way Down: God, Greed and the Cult of Gwen Shamblin."
author: Jordan Liles
